name: John D Mangual
description:
Hello world.

I am a 'data scientist' interested visualization and statistics. In order words, I like to draw pictures in JavaScript.

I went to Princeton, U Tokyo and UC Santa Barbara. I conjectured a similarity between the Math you see in Quantum Mechanics to that of Computer Graphics, Time-Series and Algorithms.

It's hard to explain why I enjoy math - a subject that people hate & misunderstand. Learning to code has changed how I reach out.

Please check out my GitHub repositories.

My online name is MonsieurCactus. I'm pretty sure you'll be amazed by the things I publish on my personal blog as well.

E-mail: john.mangual@gmail.com.
